jd: From: Raj, Softcom Systems Inc raj@softcomsystems.com Reply to: raj@softcomsystems.com Job Description: Note : Pega LSA Certification Mandatory Technical Skills: (Primary)7+ Pega LSA Certification Mandatoryyears experience with In-depth technical understanding of Pega Rules Process Commander (PRPC), Pega product knowledge and have experience with Java frameworksExperience in Pega Integrations with external Databases, Listeners, REST services, Messaging and SOAP.Troubleshoot complex application issues using Pega tools like Tracer, Pega Log Viewer, AES and PDC.Experience in Healthcare Industry is a plus but not necessary Customer service & leadershipLead, Build and Maintain a Pega 7.x/8.x application development while interfacing with and mentoring our vendor partner consultants.Co-ordinate with Technical Product Owners and Business community in refining business needs and provide technical solution.Work with Business Partners and Operational Leaders to ideate, design, develop and deliver technology solutions.Deliver reliable and secure software solutions meeting the operational specifications required through development of system logic.Review and guide code development from other team members through code reviews.Monitor all triage, debug, surveillance, performance, and scalability for all environments.Partner with Testers, having an understanding of automated testing patterns such as unit testing, mocking and automated integration testing Enforce Pega best design and coding practices and maintain high compliance level for Pega code.
